text: The Venezuelan Football Federation ( or ) is the governing body of football in Venezuela. It was founded in 1926 and affiliated in 1952. It is a member of CONMEBOL as well as FIFA, and is in charge of the Venezuela national football team. ==References== Category:1926 establishments Category:1920s establishments in South America Category:20th-century establishments in Venezuela Category:Football governing bodies in South America Category:Football in Venezuela Category:Organizations based in Venezuela
title: Venezuelan Football Federation
